duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform visual examination and functional testing on returned products as part of failure analysis
Ensure compliance with Quality System, QSR, ISO 13485, and FDA regulations
Set up and operate test equipment to evaluate the performance of parts, assemblies, or systems under various conditions, and record results
Collaborate within the department and cross-functionally to identify, define, and solve problems
Author, modify, or interpret test reports and status reports
Troubleshoot equipment and update complaint record documentation
Maintain complete and up-to-date procedures and work instructions
Manage incoming inventory in the laboratory and adjust sampling plan by region as needed

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field
